DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate technology base intervention ( physical activity tracker , text message , health coach , global positioning system enable location base feedback physical activity ) support physical activity cancer survivor complete oncology rehabilitation . In Phase 1 participant receive full intervention . In phase II participant randomly assign receive full intervention fitbit .
DOC.brief_title: Bemobile Intervention Support Physical Activity Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: This intervention , offer participant complete oncology rehabilitation , integrate known preference determinant physical activity participation woman breast cancer survivor include social support , professional guidance , self-efficacy , goal setting , self-regulation , environmental awareness deliver accessible technology . For iteration phase , investigator conduct initial , abbreviated intervention wave last 4 week ; investigator incorporate participant input feedback specific component refine intervention prior pilot trial . Means deliver component include communication support tailor text messaging , health coach phone call , self-monitoring physical activity wearable sensor , environmental assessment community physical activity option ( e.g. , park , fitness center , trail ) base global positioning system information .
DOC.criteria: Cancer diagnosis Impending graduation oncology rehabilitation Metastatic cancer Concurrent radiation chemotherapy No cell phone Inability read speak English .
